subject: Photos of how I'm researching the plane crash debris
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Greetings fellow researchers,

I'm in the middle of video taping my "Voices From The Scorched Earth" 
video for my Youtube page. I just finished Part 1 of 3. Last night I 
started on Part 2, and wanted to share a couple photos of how I'm 
attempting to measure the imprinted energy in the plane crash debris.
I've placed a coule of pics of the device with the debris on the 
following link:

http://www.ufogeek.com/prototypes/prototypespage19.htm

The picture on top, with the four pieces of debris on the small card is 
an example of what I sent out to 8 other ITC researchers so they could 
do their research on the debris.
The picture on the bottom is of much more of the debris in a glass 
container.

Just thought I'd share a bit, so you can see what's happening before I 
release my final findings.

Have a wonderful Holiday, all...
- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
